verses.verse: (For the choir director. A Psalm of David.) May the Lord <S%H3068><s%> answer <S%H6030><s%> you in the day <S%H3117><s%> of trouble! <S%H6869><s%> May the name <S%H8034><s%> of the God <S%H430><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> set <S%H7682><s%> you [securely] on high! <S%H7682><s%>
May He send <S%H7971><s%> you help <S%H5828><s%> from the sanctuary, <S%H6944><s%> And support <S%H5582><s%> you from Zion! <S%H6726><s%>

May He remember <S%H2142><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> your meal <S%H4503><s%> offerings, <S%H4503><s%> And find <S%H1878><s%> your burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering <S%H5930><s%> acceptable! <S%H1878><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
May He grant <S%H5414><s%> you your heart's desire, And fulfill <S%H4390><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> your counsel! <S%H6098><s%>

We will sing <S%H7442><s%> for joy <S%H7442><s%> over your victory, <S%H3444><s%> And in the name <S%H8034><s%> of our God <S%H430><s%> we will set <S%H1713><s%> up our banners. <S%H1713><s%> May the Lord <S%H3068><s%> fulfill <S%H4390><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> your petitions. <S%H4862><s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> I know <S%H3045><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> saves <S%H3467><s%> His anointed; <S%H4899><s%> He will answer <S%H6030><s%> him from His holy <S%H6944><s%> heaven, <S%H8064><s%> With the saving <S%H3468><s%> strength <S%H1369><s%> of His right <S%H3225><s%> hand. <S%H3225><s%>

Some <S%H428><s%> [boast <S%H2142><s%>] in chariots, <S%H7393><s%> and some <S%H428><s%> in horses; <S%H5483><s%> But we will boast in the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> our God. <S%H430><s%>
They have bowed <S%H3766><s%> down <S%H3766><s%> and fallen; <S%H5307><s%> But we have risen <S%H6965><s%> and stood <S%H9388><s%> upright. <S%H9388><s%>
Save, <S%H3467><s%> O Lord; <S%H3068><s%> May the King <S%H4428><s%> answer <S%H6030><s%> us in the day <S%H3117><s%> we call. <S%H7121><s%>
